name: PARA-DICE
description:
Run over guns to switch to them Wave based enemies. Kill all enemies per wave to advance to the next one. Health, Speed, and Damage are all automatically upgraded after each wave. It is a random D4 roll for each one. Check out the leaderboard when you die! 😉

Controls

Movement: W, A, S, D

Jump: Spacebar

Looking: Mouse

Fire: Left Click

Reload: R

How To Play with the Download:

- Download the zip file
- Extract the zip file
- Open Para-Dice.exe

Credits

- Developers: Ya'akov Goldberg & Gabriel Sloan

- Audio: Boss Battle Theme, Battle Theme 2, Battle Theme 3, RPG Battle Theme 2, Fight Battle Looped, Intro Menu Music, Gun Fire, Misc. Sounds, Hitmarker, Dice Roll

- Weapon Assets: Models

- Misc. Assets: Animation DOTween, Cell Shading
